short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for various QoL improvements in Salesforce, with emphasis on familiar design and excellent UX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
